history.proof: intros. unfold continuity_pt, ex_finite_lim in *. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_lim_continuity.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable eps.

original: intros. unfold continuity_pt, ex_finite_lim in *. intros. destruct H as [l H1]. exists l. apply (is_lim_continuity f x H0).
